title: Dynamic retry and error handling
description: Control number of retries at runtime per request

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This workflow executes a business logic Lambda function, with the number of retries configurable at runtime. It receives the number of retries wrapped around the function payload, and uses it to control the workflow execution.
This is done using Input and Output processing with intrinsic functions.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
